mapper.update: update sys_role set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enname = #{enname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, enname, description, created, updated from sys_role
